review: A very good product, easy and fun to use. It help us to "cut the cord".

review: Does not handle my bandwidth at all.  the smart tv will run amazon prime movies, This thing spends all it's time buffering, using the exact same network cable. only needed it to run sling so I guess I'll cancel the sling subscription.
